CustomField.description: For open deals, simplifies the stage to report whether the opportunity is in a Business Case Needed or Shopping phase of the buying process.
CustomField.formula: IF( Probability < 0.1, "Not Interested Yet", IF( AND( Probability < 0.2, ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Accepted__c, "Yes") ), "Pre-Shopping", IF( Probability < 1, "Shopping for a Solution", "Closed" ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For open deals, simplifies the stage to report whether the opportunity is in a Business Case Needed or Shopping phase of the buying process.
CustomField.label: Buying Phase
